about.summary: Package designed to be used with Rscript to write ``#!'' shebang scripts that accept short and long flags/options. Many users will prefer using instead the packages optparse or argparse which add extra features like automatically generated help option and usage, support for default values, positional argument support, etc.

Package designed to be used with Rscript to write ``#!'' shebang scripts that accept short and long flags/options. Many users will prefer using instead the packages optparse or argparse which add extra features like automatically generated help option and usage, support for default values, positional argument support, etc.

name: r-getopt
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.20.4" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-getopt
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: getopt_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/getopt_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/getopt/getopt_{{ version }}.tar.gz


  sha256: 87d36cbe6dba41dbc1d78d845210266cdd08c7440d977d738a6e45db14221e8b

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 0


  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - r-base

  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('getopt')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('getopt')\""  # [win]



about:
  home: https://github.com/trevorld/getopt
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Package designed to be used with Rscript to write ``#!'' shebang scripts that accept short and long flags/options. Many users will prefer using instead the packages optparse or argparse which add extra features like automatically generated help option and usage, support for default values, positional argument
    support, etc.
  license_family: GPL3



  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - dpryan79
    - croth1
